lead_paragraph: An article in some editions on Thursday about Ernie Harwell, the longtime voice of the Detroit Tigers, who has incurable cancer, referred incorrectly to the start of his broadcasting career. He began as a radio commentator in Atlanta in 1940; his start did not come in 1948 with the Brooklyn Dodgers.
